#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pi(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define s(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define p(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define MAX 100002

using namespace std;


int main(){
int t;
si(t);
while(t--){
string s;
cin>>s;
ll sum=0;
for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){
    if(isdigit(s[i])){
        sum+=(s[i]-48);
    }
}
p(sum);
}

return 0;
}
